The only exception appears to be for off the air tv having 5.1 channel sound. I do not know why the optical output capability would be limited by the manufacturer. This apparently means that you will have to do an optical (or other)output to your home theater receiver directly from the component for any HDMI component connected  directly to your tv if you want 5.1 sound through the receiver. If having to do more cabling is bothersome to you this might be of interest. I will update the review when the tv has been up and running for a while.

Reviews.Title: did not like LED back-lighting
Reviews.Author: J. Carli
Reviews.Content: I could not get the LED back-lighting right. Great picture and sound. Loved the network capability. Decided to go back to a LCD. LED lighting seemed harsh and I could not get the settings to where I liked the picture.

Reviews.Title: HEADACHE
Reviews.Author: Ralph P. Goodman "Fitness Walker"
Reviews.Content: I have had this TV for 3 months and have had several problems with it. I keep getting the message "no signal" when first turning the unit on. Everything runs through an Onkyo av receiver. Talked to Samsung several times to no avail. I have replaced the hdmi cable; reset the receiver and several other things to no avail. Before this I had a pioneer plasma set and never had this problem. If you Google Samsung, and no signal you will get several hits. I have set these kinds of systems up for years and not had these kind of headaches. I purchased a headache!

Reviews.Title: WOW
Reviews.Author: IT_Jones
Reviews.Content: I bought this on sale and it was listed as "pre-owned." Was a little worried about it but since it was being sold by Amazon itself I figured it would ok. Came in original box, with everything packaged perfectly, manuals and all. Arrived when expected and in perfect condition. The TV also has a lot more features than Amazon listed and I am just amazed by it. a lot bigger than I thought it would be (this is my first time buying a TV). The sound on this thing is great and the picture is amazing!!!! My ps3 games and movies look great on it and I can even watch TV while playing games too!!! Has a lot of little features that I haven't even used yet...but I will. And I didn't even know it was a "smart" TV with WiFi either. Has a bunch of app's already installed on it and ready to go...This TV ROCKS!!!!! LONG LIVE SAMSUNG lol

Reviews.Title: Cool down crackling
Reviews.Author: sjc
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV but be warned the plastic in the TV makes a crackling noise when the TV cools down after being on for a while.  If started about 2 months after ownership and according to Samsung is normal.  I bought this at Costco which sells it as the 6050 which is the same as the 6000 but comes with the wireless adapter.Update: this morning when I turned it on made the creeking noise for about two minutes.

Reviews.Title: Two years and it's toast....
Reviews.Author: Paul E. Barrett
Reviews.Content: I was pleased with this LED to start out with.  The picture was good, price was fair.  But after two years it now has vertical lines running through it and will cost $600 to repair.  I won't waste my time researching again, I will take my chances on a $500 model if 2years is all I'm going to get???  Screw Samsung!

Reviews.Title: Beware of Samsung
Reviews.Author: Aquascaper
Reviews.Content: A year and a half ago, I purchased a 55" HDTV from Samsung.  Everything worked as it should have, then one day vertical lines suddenly appeared on the screen.  At the time, I believed that it was a mainboard problem because the HDMI ports felt loose.  I should mention that I rarely, if ever, touched the cables.I called Samsung support, and they charged us $60 to send a technician to diagnose the problem.  He took a 30 second look at it and decided it must be the panel, even though I was insistent about the HDMI ports.  I figured that the technician probably knew more than I did so I ended up contacting the repair department to have a new panel installed.  They offered to replace the panel, specifically stating that we wouldn't have to pay anything, part or labor.In came the same technician, who just replaced the panel.  The problem persisted, and he finally came to the realization that the issue lies in the mainboard due to loose HDMI ports.  He then proceeded to charge us $160 for labor.  So now I'm out $220 and still have a broken TV with a mainboard that is NOT covered because Samsung misdiagnosed the problem.  On top of that, getting through to their repair service department on the phone has proven very difficult.You would think that an HDTV costing over $1,500 would last longer than 18 months of moderate use, that Samsung could send someone who could accurately diagnose the problem, and that they would fix it after charging you $220 for repairs.I used to be a fan of Samsung, having bought several product from them, but I can't recommend them anymore.  If they treat their loyal customers like this, then it's time to find companies that can deliver on their products.

Reviews.Title: Did not last long!
Reviews.Author: Luredez
Reviews.Content: I bought the TV as new. Satisfying at first,good picture quality, but after 20 months just after the factory warranty lapsed, it died on me. I paid 35 dollars for the diagnosis thinking it is just a simple problem (horizontal lines that taper from left to right) but the pro said, the panel is bad which is worth $600 dollars or more. I PROMISE MYSELF I WILL NEVER BUY ANOTHER SAMSUNG PRODUCT AGAIN.

Reviews.Title: Samsung has the Worst Customer Service Possible
Reviews.Author: Jon Smith
Reviews.Content: Service: Rating - Worst Customer Service PossibleI purchased the 2011 Samsung 6000 LED Smart TV for a Christmas present with 240 Motion Plus. Unfortunately, the television had a defected computer and it did not have the ability to remember passwords or settings and you entered on the computer which meant we had to type in the passwords manually every time it connected to the internet, netflix, etc (I have other smart tvs and devices that do not have that problem). I called Samsung within a month of the purchase. The level 1 technicians at Samsung were not familiar with the product and they gave you instructions and mentioned applications that are not relevant to the product (they tell you to go to a certain screen or click on something that did not exist on this model). After you carefully explain to them that that option is not there, they are baffled. The level 2 technicians never return your call or pick up the phone (I called 10+ times). I eventually was able to elevate it and scheduled a local service center to stop by the house and view the product (from my phone conversation, he was confident he needed to replace most of the processor on the tv with with a newer product). This was 3 weeks+ later. Right before he placed his order, Samsung canceled the order (of course they did not notify me of the change). I called them up and after several attempts, I was able to get another service center scheduled to come by (they would not let me use the other center for some reason). Unfortunately, after we had it all scheduled out with the second service center (hours before they are suppose to arrive), Samsung decides to cancel the latest ticket. Of course, Samsung did not have the courteous to let you know (the local service center and I were puzzled but he said he couldn't come out since Samsung canceled the ticket). I called back for the 20th + time and then Samsung said they canceled it because they wanted to offer me a new tv instead (I simply wanted the tv to work but based on their track record, I realized Samsung was not able to service it and did not appear to be willing to service it - 3+ weeks and 30+ calls later). I decided to wait to hear what model they would offer. Two days later, they said they would offer the 46D7000 tv (a nice upgrade that is 6 inches larger, has a better contrast ratio and is a 3D tv). For once, I thought Samsung was looking out for their customer (especially, since I had 6 other HDTVs by Samsung). They said they would deliver it within 10 business days. 9 Business days later, I call Samsung for a status update since no on contacted me. They then mentioned the replacement was canceled since they ran out of the 46D7000 tv (of course Samsung did not offer the courteous of calling you to let you know). I asked them what the alternatives were. They then offered 2012 model that costs $500 less and had a fraction of the features (it was not a Smart TV so it could not connect to the internet/netflix and had less than half the inputs, etc). I was angry with this since the entire purpose was the smart tv functions. Finally, they offered a different model (they later reneged on the offer for some reason) which was a smart tv with a closer price range (still cost less) but it had 1/5 the contrast ratio and was missing several ports. Advice: never purchase a Samsung product as this will be my last Samsung purchase. In short their offer changed from the a near top of the line LED product (Samsung 46D7000) to the bottom of the line product in a matter of a week. Fortunately, Amazon offers good customer service and offered me a full return for the TV and the wireless card even after the 4 week return policy expired.TV:Beautiful picture overall. But it has some slight bleeding issues on the corners when the format is not 16:9 (full screen, extra wide screen, etc).  The sound was clear for tv speakers.  Overall, I was very satisfied with the TV itself. It had numerous inputs and outputs for expansion (4 hdmi, 3 USBs, etc).Smart Features:The Smart applications (after you manually typed in the passwords each time you connected) were severely lagged (took 2 minutes to load) and years behind the competitors. It took at least 30 secs to a minute to view the description for a netflix movie (in Roku or blu ray players it happens instantly). If you want a Smart TV (which I do), you definitely need to purchase another brand as Samsung does not offer a Smart TV in the 2011 or 2012 lineup. Alternatively, you can purchase a Roku device which works great with no lag and is the same price as one of Samsung's networking USD cards.It would be a better idea to pay less and get a higher quality product such as a Sony tv. It's definitely not possible to offer lower quality service or a dumber "Smart" product than Samsung .

Reviews.Title: Disappointing
Reviews.Author: Ella Sitkin
Reviews.Content: I am very disappointed at the "smart" part of this Samsung HDTV. Sure, you can stream Netflix, HuluPlus and others directly with no need for a Roku or whatever box you want to use. But...without fail, every single Netflix movie I've streamed has caused the TV to reboot itself somewhere in the middle of the movie. And HuluPlus - forget it. It can't keep up with HD streaming and even if you change it to SD, I've never been able to stream through a whole show without it choking.So, I have to connect my laptop to play Hulu and I bought an AppleTV to stream everything else (like Netflix). So I might as well have gone with a dumb HDTV.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Smart TV 55
Reviews.Author: Natale A. Fruci
Reviews.Content: Outstanding product.  However, the smart software could be more user friendly.  The picture quality is excellent.  Great value for the price.

Reviews.Title: Crystal Clear With Fantastic Colors
Reviews.Author: M. Wojcik
Reviews.Content: I didn't want a 3D TV nor did I need all the software features of the "higher up" models.  Although Samsung is evasive (on their website) of the connections on this TV vs the 6300 series, they are all the same.  I use my AV system for sound - this is the monitor for the TiVo, BluRay and MacMini. Fantastic!  Great value for the money.

Reviews.Title: possible lemon?
Reviews.Author: Maki Michii
Reviews.Content: well i bought this tv after i had also previously purchased its un32d5500 60 hz cousin.  this set unlike the d5500 had a version of h302 vs h303 for the d5500.whatever changes were made they must have been significant.  the d5500 had a pretty flawless panel aside from the slight banding which is inherent in the ultraclear coating.  this set has bad clouding and a possibly defective opamp or some component in the amp section.  the sound hisses at 1 and is echoing and tinny. Those that complained of really awful sound might have been experiencing this because the sound from a very similar d5500 sounded quite full for such little speakers.i'm in the process of exchanging this set for another d6000.  i hope the second set is not a lemon too. i want to love this set so maybe the second set will justify the price difference from the d5500.As always amazon has the best customer service around and promptly arranged for a replacement.  As for samsung these sets are great this would be my fourth but its like playing the lottery hoping to get a good one of the bunch.  Hopefully there is an h303 version of this model.

Reviews.Title: truly one of the best, for its price, on the market
Reviews.Author: W. M. Landers
Reviews.Content: Screen size is awesome to us, as we had a big 32" before.  Picture and color and adjustments are top flight.  Would have been better with less complex input slots, now have to change cables to watch separate DVDs, but that is very minor.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV!... just can say great TV! very happy
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: i got the TV today... all i can say is wow, this TV met the expectation i reviewed for several weeks, i reviewed many TV at the end i chose for this one since i wanted a LED and this one was not that expensive, excellent prize and great quality, i got more than i needed. this TV has many features for WEB, i havent checked them all.

Reviews.Title: LED TV looks great
Reviews.Author: Flyguy50
Reviews.Content: HD LED TV, purchased through Amazon was delivered on time.  Transport guys called ahead to advise time of delivery.  Good experience.  TV installed and looks great.  No problems, just a great picture.  Built in TV speakers produce above average sound quality.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN46D6000
Reviews.Author: Lydia
Reviews.Content: Have had this TV for 2 years with no problems!!! Love it!!! It's very user friendly and I love the Smart features!

Reviews.Title: Good picture - not internet ready
Reviews.Author: K
Reviews.Content: Good picture and easy setup.  Smart tv hub for internet connections is slow and with limited apps.  Recommend sound bar for better experience.

Reviews.Title: Very clear picture
Reviews.Author: William K. Gibler
Reviews.Content: Very clear picture. The LED system is much better than the LCD technology. Looks great from a distance (20 feet).

Reviews.Title: Wonderful picture and styling.
Reviews.Author: Pat Lamb
Reviews.Content: There is wonderful picture quality on this set.  It was easy to set up and looks great hanging on the wall.

Reviews.Title: Significant Light Bleed And Unreliable Smart Hub Apps
Reviews.Author: shek
Reviews.Content: There is very significant light bleed from the LEDs across the majority of the screen, which is easily noticeable during black or dark scenes. The picture looks great otherwise, but it's hard to ignore the bright splotches. I have also experienced lots of problems with a number of the Smart Hub apps. The Netflix app crashes pretty regularly, causing the entire TV to restart. I still believe that Samsung makes some of the best looking TVs available, but I don't think I would buy this model if I could do it again.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LED Technology is Awful (Flashlighting/Light Leakage)
Reviews.Author: Charles A. Robinson
Reviews.Content: Samsung LED technology is fundamentally flawed, as is their assembly.  The flashlighting and light leakage issues you see online for various products is not a rarity -- it's bad enough that they don't cover it under their warranty and claim it is "as designed."I spent over three dozen hours on the phone with Samsung and had three separate repair visits.  In each case, Samsung denied the repairs -- even when the technician sent said it was clearly horrible.Want to watch your TV only during the day?  Go for it.  Intend to watch it in a dark room?  Avoid Samsung LED televisions like the plague.Are there some good panels out there?  Yes.  But if you're unfortunate enough to get a bad one, Samsung will not honor your warranty.  Want pictures of how horrible it looks and proof of what they do during the process?  Would be happy to share.I love Samsung products in general, but I recommend avoiding all Samsung LEDs -- literally the worst product I've ever owned for the price.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful picture
Reviews.Author: angel
Reviews.Content: Love this tv beautiful picture so vivid super thin.looks like your can touch the actors ..I would recommend this to my ffriends.a must buy

Reviews.Title: Poor
Reviews.Author: MN
Reviews.Content: 2 years and it's broken - screen full of vertical lines.  Poor quality as other TVs I have had have lasted much longer

Reviews.Title: Amazing Picture
Reviews.Author: Rocco Z
Reviews.Content: I have owned this TV along with a Sharp 40" Quattron over the last year.  Both TV's offer incredibly vivid, true-tone color images.  Both are beautiful to look at and have easy to manipulate remotes.  But, in the end, the Samsung is superior in a few ways.  1)- it hands down has the sharper, more detailed, blacker blacks picture.  2)- The Samsung has a minimal amount of frame around the screen, it looks sleeker.  3)- The interface on the Samsung is much clearer.  Watching Discovery or National Geographic on the Samsung is mesmerizing.  The picture seems to have depth to it, sort of 3-D without the glasses.  Sports present in truly natural color with continuous sharp images and no fast movement (action) blur. I must say that I have fallen in love with this TV!

Reviews.Title: best tv ever
Reviews.Author: FrankV
Reviews.Content: Great TV with exceptional picture.  Much better than thePanasonic that it replaced.  I highly recommend this TV.  Price, Picture and ease of use

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: CHARLES F SCHNEIDER
Reviews.Content: Shopped around for 2months before buying and have had it for 2years with no problems. The picture is great and there are so many ways to adjust picture and sound both preset configurations and customizable.  The only "issue" we have had is the Smart TV section can be a little slow or occasionally hang but some of that may be contributed to by our basic tier of High Speed Internet.  I was a little concerned about the downward facing speakers at first but they work just fine.Definitely would recommend to others.

Reviews.Title: Why did we wait so long?
Reviews.Author: Marcia Vogl
Reviews.Content: We had been watching our old Sony Trinitrom which was the best 25 years ago.  We just got used to it.  We finally got the new flat screen.  The HD is great and we could redecorate our room without the "big box."

Reviews.Title: Broke after 16 months
Reviews.Author: Vachik Sanati
Reviews.Content: I bought this item 16 months ago and now I have black shades on both side of the tv and. Some times it restart by itself. I hope it is still under warranty....  Not happy :(

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: Curt Snow
Reviews.Content: We really like this tv and we get such a good picture.  My husband is a sports fan so he really enjoys it

Reviews.Title: Excellent Screen
Reviews.Author: Ras Nya
Reviews.Content: I just bought this about 2 weeks ago! I know it's a 2011 model but I was hooked on the design and the ample input and output options. The newer models of the same series are bulkier and they reduced the number of in/output options i.e 2011 has 4HDMI while the newer ones have 3 or 2. So, there are my main reasons I had to get the older model besides the $400 drop from when it was originally released.  The set needs some adjusting on color settings. Invest $1.99 on THX Tune Up app from the apple store. This app will help you calibrate your TV settings to optimize the the vivid pictures it's capable of. This calibration is way cheaper than what your local electronic store will charge for the service. The app has a voice tutorial that walks you through all the settings needed. And not to mention the bonus trailers they have for you to enjoy the fruits of your labor. After calibration, the colors are lucid; black scenes are black and not a gray hue while white scenes are white. Simply put, lifelike. I haven't experienced the flashlight effect other viewers are experiencing. Note: The tune up app can be connected from your iPhone or iPad to your TV via AV adapter or if you have apple TV via airplay. The coolest part, you can use this app to calibrate all the screens you own or if you feel inclined and full of endorphins your friends' and extended family TVs (tube or flat screen). "Giving back to the community!"

Reviews.Title: LOVE MY TV!
Reviews.Author: Deborah A. Roulston
Reviews.Content: Great TV. I love Samsung products. My TV was delivered earlier than I expected. I would definitely recommend this TV to anyone looking for a great size and performance TV.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Benjamin
Reviews.Content: I have it angle mounted on my wall about 8-10 feet away and this is a good sized TV.  I have it permanently hooked to my PC and serving as a monitor over HDMI.  I use it daily for youtube, hulu, etc.  I personally think the smart TV functionality in any modern TV is useless at this point.  Until the processors/memory/etc dedicated to that function are stronger, it will be substantially weaker than having a PC hooked up to it.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Most Beuatiful TV
Reviews.Author: Dom Perignon
Reviews.Content: This 2011 D series TV is one of the most beautiful TV built by Samsung. As thin as most 2012 models, the clear glass bezel, the clear glass foot stand make it float on a table top. I have a 60" and now a 55". After calibration, setting it on Natural and pumping up the sharpness a bit the picture is plenty sharp although it is advertised as having only 5000 sharpness, much less than most 2012 comparable size Samsung TV costing $400 to $500 more. In any case I use front projection on a 8' screen for watching the best material like movies. For casual viewing those 2 TV are near perfect and beautiful. Some new Samsung TVs with a thinner bezel look like junk to me by comparison. Also I am partial to black bezels.

Reviews.Title: Decent tv
Reviews.Author: David R. Sampson
Reviews.Content: The picture is fine nothing over the top. I see no difference in this and my older Toshiba. If you can find this set on sale I would go for it- otherwise I would stay put.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: Daniel Nguyen
Reviews.Content: it's a great tv.  i turn off clear motion.  the smarttv apps user interface need improvement. but other than that it's a good tv for it's price.

Reviews.Title: Superb left me speachless
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: Ive gone to many stores and malls and Seeing this Smart tv around all the other models and brands this one really caught my eye everytime. Since its my first time buying my own tv, i bought the UN40D6000 and have had it for 5 months so far with no problems at all. Seeing it all set up was a beauty and after calaberating the tv for movies and games on the best settings i thought i made a great investment. Watching movies the shows or movies are so amazing the colors and picture is breathtaking and vibrant. I then bought a PS3 a week later because im an avid gamer and also like to watch blueray dvds. Connecting the PS3 or my gaming laptop via HDMI cable to the tv is pure bliss, whether watching movies or gaming i  was and still am amazed and speechless everytime i see this tv in my room. I had high expectations for this tv but sometimes you got to be creative and find other ways to use your tv where it lacks such as apps or internet. here are my list of pro's and cons.Pros-Beautiful vibrant displayHigh definition TVSurround Sound HD (I personally think that the sound was great with or without the sound bar or theatre sorround sound hooked up. For the people who want perfect sound straight from the box just save your money and get a sound theatre system of your liking if your that picky.)everything else about the tv is great.Cons (every tv has its flaws somewhere)Whether your model has an internet browser or not it may be slow.Samsung apps can also be slowRecommendations:Id recommend you to buy a PS3 along with a wireless keyboard for the Internet browser built in & for games and Blue ray DvDs.

Reviews.Title: Great Hardware, Shame about the Smart TV software
Reviews.Author: Barry
Reviews.Content: I loved this TV when I bought it - The Specs/Price ratio was really good.  This is a beautiful TV, with a great picture, minimal clouding, decent blacks.  For the price, a great spec.However, I feel completely let down by the 'Smart TV' interface.  It's slow, clunky.  (For example, when you start the 'smart' interface, it hangs for 10 seconds while it populates the available videos and apps sections.  The Hulu app is good, but the Netflix app is poor: it's slow, unstable, and leaks memory after a few hours use, the TV has to be restarted.  There's no Amazon Video-on-Demand for this model, despite demand for it, and hints and suggestions from Samsung otherwise.  They eventually gave up the pretense that it was coming a few months back.  As soon as the 2012 line of these TVs came along, Samsung basically dropped all efforts to improve the 2011 software outside of bugfix firmware updates.In short - If you can get this (2011) model on a good price, go for it, the hardware/display is great - But don't expect too much out of the inbuilt software - Plan to use an external box such as a Roku.This was the third, and probably last Samsung TV I'll buy, unless reviews in a year for their 2012 line suggest they've hired some decent software developers.  Shame.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: Peter
Reviews.Content: We've had this for about a year and it's been great. It works like a charm. Great picture, ridiculously thin, and we love the integration of Pandora/Hulu/Netflix/HBOGo etc. through the SmartTV feature. We also got a wonderful deal through Amazon.Our biggest complaint is just that the SmartTV navigation can seem a bit sluggish at times and it takes ~ 30 seconds to 1 minute to go from turning on the TV to watching something on Hulu or Netflix. It's a minor annoyance but worth mentioning since everything else just seems wonderfully thought out and put together.

Reviews.Title: Great TV & HBO Go Compatible!
Reviews.Author: Amanda
Reviews.Content: I was about to buy the newest Samsung Smart TV model until I happened to find out that it was not HBO Go compatible in the Smart TV apps section!  I'm so glad I found out since that was one of my main reasons for going with a Samsung Smart TV!  These older models, however, are completely compatible.  I'm not sure why they stopped doing it, but these are great.  I love having all the apps available on the TV so I can hook it up to my Netflix, Hulu, and HBO accounts to watch every on my own time and not have to worry about rentals or catching shows on time if I forget to DVR them.  The picture and brightness is great, and there are so many options in the menu to adjust it to your liking.  I got a used TV from Custom Bytes Computers, as well, an have had no issues at all 6 months later.  Very pleased with my big purchase!

Reviews.Title: Great TV, Poor Operating Instructions, Do not use smart TV
Reviews.Author: the bear
Reviews.Content: I purchased the TV last summer.  I do not like 3D so that feature was out.  I watch a lot of sports and wanted a TV that had a refresh rate higher than 60HZ.  This Tv has a 120HZ refresh rate.I also do not need the smart TV feature.  I tried netflix streaming using ROKU on my old sony TV and have been disappointed as the to choices available.  So I rent netflix DVD's and have them mailed.  I also have a blue ray player but do not use any of its capabilities other than playing DVD's and have not tried to play anyBD disks.So I tried to find a good TV without a lot of bells and whistles.  Picture quality has been excellent.  I have not had flashlighting problems, pixels missing etc.This TV has been excellent with no problems in over a year.  I am rating it a 4 star as I have not used all the smart TV features and understand they are cumbersome to use.  Also the instruction manual is lame with no explanation of how to apply the various picture setting except a one sentence explanation of what that control does.  Maybe there is more detail on the online instructions.My short list for another TV is still samsung or LG.  Need to do more research.  I will try and find a 40in with no 3D and if possible no smart TV features.  Why pay for features that I will not use.  No smart TV features may be going the way of the basic mobile phone being hard to come buy and not many choices.

Reviews.Title: Very happy with this TV
Reviews.Author: Hannibal "Han"
Reviews.Content: I've had this for just over a year now and it's wonderful. HD is great, it's stable and I use the dongle for wireless and it works fine. Some settings such as "Grey bar" format are annoying and I still can't figure out how to get it off of ther. But other than that blu-ray does justice ont his tv and HD, reliability, longevity and size. This TV seems to have them all so far. Samsung makes great tv's but their players are garbage, and my sony receiver can't tell when the tv turns on (bravia vs Anynet), and the don't talk to each other, very sad, which is why this got only 4 stars.---UPDATE---TV Still rox! Nice job Samsung! WE LOVE YOUR T.V.s! Kudos, props.. etc :)Reset to factory to get rid of greybar.

Reviews.Title: Why no update?
Reviews.Author: unhappy
Reviews.Content: TV is great, but Samsung apps are terrible and there are no updates available.  I would love to have Amazon Video on Demand, and thought buying the best brand out there would allow me to update and technology became more widely available.  Shame on Samsung for not supporting "older" models (and by older, I mean 2011)!

Reviews.Title: Husband LOVES it
Reviews.Author: Quilter Deluxe
Reviews.Content: Recommended by our son who researches every purchase to death. With the great sale price over the holiday season, it was on back order for a while. Amazon did keep us up to date on when it would be available to ship. Due to the delay, they did ask us again if we still wanted it. It arrived-even the delivery guys helped us to open it up to make sure it arrived in perfect condition. We are so satisfied with our purchase.

Reviews.Title: No Issues.
Reviews.Author: ledowner
Reviews.Content: I have had this exact TV for over a year, and have it wall mounted. It is hooked up to 7.1 Ch Onkyo home theater system. I also have a Samsung Blu Ray player. I did not buy this from Amazon.  I really feel bad for the folks that have had issues with theirs, because mine has exceeded my expectations.No issues with quality, picture, sound. Nothing to complain about.

Reviews.Title: Huge Backlight Bleed Problems
Reviews.Author: charles desbiens "roisoleil31"
Reviews.Content: This would be a great product if it was not of the light bleeding issue. I was aware of this issue when I bought the TV, but it is very apparent when watching dark scenes and the bright spots are not just limited to the edges, they cover a great deal of the screen. Would not recommend buying this product. Keep away from it and look for another product with limited or non-existent backlight bleed issues, otherwise you may regret it. Go with LG or Sharp.

Reviews.Title: Good for several months; and then...
Reviews.Author: wiq45
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV on 12/11/11 and enjoyed using it (sparingly) for about 4 months.  Then, there was a pop and the sound of broken pieces falling inside the case.  Samsung support said that I would need to take it to an authorized repair facility for repairs, which I did.  A couple of weeks later I was told that the board had to be replaced....a couple of weeks later I received a call from Samsung stating that the board replacement did not correct the problem and that a panel would be needed; therefore, they were going to send a new replacement TV within a couple of weeks.  I was told that they would email a shipping label for me to return the old TV and I was given the support person's phone number.  Following that, I have not received the shipping lable nor have I received the courtesy of a reply to my many, many calls to the support person.All of the folks I have spoken with at Samsung are very nice; but, I'm growing more and more frustrated.The TV was great for the short time it was in service.  I have since purchased another Samsung to use while we await the replacement; but, I don't know that I would purchase another based on the lack of service for this unit.

Reviews.Title: Silent Movies?
Reviews.Author: S. L. Scott "Princess Geek"
Reviews.Content: I agree with the other reviews -- the picture quality is great.  We are happy with all its many features, but my concern is sound.  The sound on this was so bad that we had to hook it up to our stereo speakers.  At first we thought it would be better if it were not in a cabinet, but even out of the cabinet, the sound was terrible.  The TV we were replacing, which we thought was truly awful, sounds a million times better!

Reviews.Title: Great TV!!!
Reviews.Author: Wai Leong
Reviews.Content: One of the better TV I ever bought for the price I paid!  Great choice!  Highly recommend it to others.

Reviews.Title: Nine months later and loving it
Reviews.Author: Irish Oatmeal
Reviews.Content: I purchased this in July 2012 from Amazon. First, I was amazed to receive a flatscreen in good condition by mail order. Then, I found it quite easy to set up with cable, receiver and speakers. I'm not a technical person, but I have to say that the picture quality is outstanding! Rich, bright colors. High definition makes it even better than going to the movie theaters.  I don't have blu-ray; however, I can't imagine it to be much better.  Attached to 201 Series Bose bookcase speakers, I enjoy great sound, and don't need more in my small condo apartment.  The UN40D6000 built-in speakers are pretty bad if you care about fidelity.  So I recommend some external ones.  I've only just begun to take advantage of the SMART part of this TV as I hadn't gotten a router until now.  All in all I recommend this item wholeheartedly. There are newer models now, but I expect they should be comparable.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Harry
Reviews.Content: Good TV and great quality. I bought this to replace my very old TV that would not stop working. I knew I wanted a LED TV + Smart TV. I did not care about the 3D feature. And bought this during a good sale for around 1000 dollars.Personally I did not like the smart tv features as it is missing the surfing the web capabilities (But none of the TVs of this generation has browser capabilities; so it is not Samsung's fault. Smart TV technology is still a new technology and lots of room to grow). I ended up getting a Logitech Revue with Google TV with surfing the web capabilities. Together they work great!

Reviews.Title: Super thin awesomeness
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: I bought this from Amazon Warehouse- it's their refurb shop. It was marked in Like-New condition and did not disappoint. I also bought the Mount-It! Ultra Slim LED TV Wall Mount which only pushes it .44 inches from the wall. The TV itself is 1.2 inches, so the whole thing is less than 2 inches from the wall. It looks like a piece of fine art!I also chose the white-glove delivery and everything when smoothly. Would buy again!

Reviews.Title: Great HD picture
Reviews.Author: PS in LA
Reviews.Content: I looked at a lot of big screens before buying this set. In every case, it had the best picture of any in the stores I went to. My personal preference is LED over plasma, mostly because I like the brightness of LED better than how plasmas look. I've had it on the wall for about two weeks now and have been using it with several different kinds of sources. I have not adjusted anything in it so far, so my comments are based on what content looks like on this set right out of the box.The UN60 is fed from a Tivo HD for both live and recorded TV content. HD broadcast looks really great in both 1080i and 720: very good detail and contrast. Blacks look pretty darn black to me, so the argument about how plasmas do this better seems not to matter. I don't see any LED bleed anywhere. Standard 480 TV seems to vary a bit; sometimes it seems kind of dark, other times not so much. This occurs both with live broadcast and Tivo playback. I don't know what to make of this yet; maybe an adjustment on the set will affect this, but I have not tried yet, or maybe that is just how the broadcasts really look. DVDs and Blu Ray look spectacular on this set; in my opinion they look better than movies in a theater. I do not use the audio in the set, so I can't comment on that.All in all I'm very happy with the UN60D6000.It's last years model, and doesn't have 3D, but does have a great picture, especially in HD.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: buttons & bows
Reviews.Content: Although a part was missing, Samsung customer service put a rush on the part & I received it in a week as opposed to the customary two weeks.  The picture is fantastic.  This was a major purchase for me & a wise one.  Samsung is really great.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, great price
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: Delivered on time, down into the basement. Polite guys assembled it for me. Made sure eveything worked. Hauled out the packaging.Great customer service. Samsung 55" pic is beyond compare. This is our 2nd Samsung. 46" we bought last year is now upstairs. I'll  buy again.

Reviews.Title: Review for 32" UN32D600
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Pozo "Jonny P"
Reviews.Content: My Review is based on using this led tv as a computer monitor, gaming machine and movie screen.Build : quality is great. I own other 40" samsung tvs and they all lasted over 2 years. They are build to last.  This is no different. I like the material , feel and the size. LED screen is so thin im really impressed.Inputs/Outputs: so many... you cant go wrong. hdmi avi optical. all workMovies: look awesome. 120hz 1080p are great specs. I use my ps3 to watch blue rays and you can see the difference in quality compared to my other older 40" samsung tvs that also have 120hz.Computer monitor:  I mainly use this for my computer so I have more to say on this. After lots of research this was the best monitor / screen for my computer that was a 32" . I personally think its the best size because 20"s are to small and 40"s are too big. Tried both and 32" is definitely great screens for all computer uses especially gaming and movies. One thing you got to know about this screen is i went for this one instead of the mid range 32" that samsung  has because this model has a 5million:1 contrast ratio while the lower models have a much lower contrast ratio.  I have gf460 graphics cards in sli and i ran a hdmi cable to the TV.  IMPORTANT: although the specs says it can run at 1920 resolution, you can run it only at 1650resolution. This happens only when you are in the main windows screen and using programs. if you put the resolution at 1920 its no clear for some reason. probably something they didn't say. BUTTTT in games you can run 1920 resolutions and looks impressive. Ive run battlefield 3 1920 resolutions, Mass Effect 3 1920 and league of legends @ 1650. So while in windows you will have to run at 1650 and in games you have the options to run to max resolution.Samsung Aps : Have not tried / probably wont ever touch. Sorry. If you need internet i see it easier to use your computer. Run a laptop to you tv for netflix. simple as that. Just my 2 cents.Overall I like my purchase and I can see using this for many years to come. it met my usage of computer, games and movies.Rate this A-  : + Great led tv that can be used as a computer monitor and you dont have to spend 1,000+ on a 32" dell computer monitor  - the Resolution quirks brought it down a little .

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV UN46D6000
Reviews.Author: Lee 1
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is vary good as well as the sound quality. Still have to figure out the internet aspect of this TV.  Just hung the TV yesterday so still learning alot about the the workings.  Always like Samsung TV's and products

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase
Reviews.Author: J. Woodard
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV to replace our 12 year old 20" Sony Trinitron.  Along with the TV I bought the Samsung wireless USB adapter; it was a breeze to setup.  I haven't accessed my Netflix account yet as I need to add streaming to my account, so I cannot comment on playback over WIFI.I have three minor gripes; 1.> The glass stand and bezel around the TV are terribly sensitive to fingerprints and smudges.  2.> If you're not careful you can easily mount the TV crooked as the mount itself is small in diameter.  I did this not realizing it until I had placed the TV where I wanted it to go.  I had to unplug everything, take it down, adjust the TV and tighten the screws (more of an annoyance than anything else).  This is not entirely Samsung's fault, but I think they could have come up with a better mounting unit. 3.> The speakers are just terrible and the reviews stating they sound like a tin can are spot on.  I consider this only a minor gripe because I have the unit connected to my Sony theater system and have the internal speakers switched off.In summary, if you're at this price point for a 32" TV I highly recommend this unit.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding Television for the Money
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: I spent weeks pouring over descriptions and reviews of televisions before deciding on the Samsung UN40D6000 LED HDTV. I am extremely pleased with the product. With the range of features, picture and sound quality and relative ease of use, it is a heck of a TV for the price.

Reviews.Title: samsung tv
Reviews.Author: Brent
Reviews.Content: great tv. took a little getting used to the settings. Best price I could find anywhere and was shipped fast

Reviews.Title: Amazing TV
Reviews.Author: PaulyD
Reviews.Content: I spent a lot of time reviewing different TVs and finally decided to pull the trigger. I am very satisfied with my decision to go with this TV. The colors are great and the black levels are impressive. I recommend plugging the TV into the internet to update the firmware and software as soon as you get it. This is a very slick TV and looks good on my wall mount. I highly recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful TV
Reviews.Author: Rgs0213
Reviews.Content: Bought this back in November for a SUPER price and I couldn't be happier.. After messing with all the setting for about 3 weeks, the picture looks perfect (in my eyes).. I did have a light flashlight effect coming from the bottom left corner but it seems to have almost completely gone away over time.. I would not hesitate to buy another Samsung TV in the future..

Reviews.Title: love this tv
Reviews.Author: Kim Whitted
Reviews.Content: TV was easy to set up. Simple to use and figure out. great picture!We bought it on black friday for a super price. Couldnt be any happier with our purchase. Amazon does a fantastic job with shipping.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic TV
Reviews.Author: atari400
Reviews.Content: We purchased this TV a little over 3 months ago now and could not be more pleased. It's worth taking some time to setup the colors and the other settings (motion/blur control etc.) but it is worth the investment in time.People who visit our home stop and stare at the TV. We had a great deal on this TV from Amazon during Black Friday, and even now several months later we are still ahead of the prices advertised by many electronics dealers.I have not tried the SMART apps yet too much as we just wanted a TV to, well, watch TV.

Reviews.Title: Best LED TV I've ever owned!
Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv to replace a smaller 32" LCD tv I had. WOW what a upgrade, the Smart Hub to stream Netflix, HBO Go, YouTube and Pandora are amazing. I was let down when I found out it doesn't have built in wireless. I bought a Rosewill RNX-N1 Wireless-N 2.0 Dongle 02.11b/g/n USB2.0 that works perfect with the tv and saved me the $70.00 price Samsung wants for theirs.I only had one problem with the tv...Netflix Activation in the Smart Hub, at first it wouldn't activate Netflix because in the Smart Hub under Settings>Properties>Details the Netflix ESN said "Not Support [X]". The tv supports Netflix 100% and that's one of the main reasons I bought it. Samsung Facebook Support was wonderful and sent some kind of signal or update when I gave them my serial number and it loaded in a ESN number and activated. If you run into this problem just email them at smsupport@sea.samsung.com and they will fix it.Overall with the performance of the tv and the one issue I had but resolved quickly I give this tv a 5 star. Great value and a amazing tv overall.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN46D6000
Reviews.Author: CLB
Reviews.Content: Great purchase.  Several of my friends own and referred me to the Samsung brand. Ordering through amazon was seamless and tax free.  Best Buys in store price was only $50 more.

Reviews.Title: TV that I was looking for
Reviews.Author: Jacob Brown
Reviews.Content: A Smart TV that will connect with you in ways you've never imagined before. Once you discover Samsung Smart TV you'll never look at TV the same way again - and the 46-inch Samsung UN46D6000 LED TV is your starting point. Smart TV gives you access to the best of the Internet, along with Samsung Apps and the ability to search content both online and on your TV. And its Energy Star rating means it performs beautifully while conserving electricity ? and helping to lower your utility bills.

Reviews.Title: Very nice TV
Reviews.Author: SAS
Reviews.Content: I love my new tv. The only thing I don't like is the size of the clock. I mean, really, it's sooooo tiny! I also would like to have had a sleep button on the remote but other than that it's a great tv.

Reviews.Title: 46 inch samsung LED TV
Reviews.Author: Patricia Widerman
Reviews.Content: Everyone that sees this TV remarks on how clear the picture is. I would definately recommend this television to all my friends.

Reviews.Title: satisfied
Reviews.Author: happygirl62
Reviews.Content: Ordered this model number on the advise of a friend. It exceeds all my expectations. Beautiful picture. Very happy!! This was easy to set up too. I have no experience at all and was able to do it by my self.

Reviews.Title: wow what a tv
Reviews.Author: althea
Reviews.Content: cannot believe i waited this long to upgrade to LEDthis tv is amazing and the price i got was terrificsuper fast shippingabt electronics is awesomedo not hesitate to use them great seller

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: William
Reviews.Content: The TV is awesome with a very nice picture and easy to operate. I love it also because of the apps. If you are looking to purchase a 32" this model would be the one. What are you waiting for...go for it through Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: BigSkyGrandy
Reviews.Content: A little hard to set up the smart tv  aspect.  Needs additional antennae, but once set up a great way to do away with another device hooked up to tv.  Great picture and good support with Samsung folks.  Would recommend this unit.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Rob Roy "woodworker"
Reviews.Content: This TV is an excellent product. The picture is clear and crisp and the colors correct as delivered. It did not need any adjustment. The delivery was prompt, although there was a mixup with UPS locally. The only drawback to this unit was a weak sound, which was corrected by the addition of a Panasonic sound bar (BT-210) mounted on the wall. We are quite satisfied with this system, which replaced a six year old 32" SONY with a CRT (now in the bedroom). Another good purchase from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Service
Reviews.Author: Bob in Fla.
Reviews.Content: Experiance was great, although some small problem arose, but was corrected quickly and in a very fast manner.  TV is wonderful,  but back up service was exceptional.

Reviews.Title: Crappy smart hub and cheaply made remote.. Screens gorgeous
Reviews.Author: Ravin "Ravin"
Reviews.Content: Very highly advertised samsung smarthub lags soo bad that I decided not to use it at all. Remote is made with delicate cheap plastic and lags really bad communicating with the tv and I have tried changing the remote as week. The only advantages are gorgeous screen and thin lightweight design.

Reviews.Title: Ridiculously clear picture
Reviews.Author: ~joy~
Reviews.Content: We bought ours at Costco for a fraction of the price listed here, but it was still a chunk of change.  That being said, it is fantastic!  Yes, it is a huge television, but for those who are either accustomed to a big screen or those who wanted to go big, it's wonderful.  It's incredibly thin and amazingly light for the size.  The stand doesn't look like it should support it, but it does.  We have cats, and that was a major concern, since they get up onto the TV stand.  They've rubbed against it to mark it as theirs, but they haven't been able to budge it otherwise.  It does swivel on the pedestal, though I don't know that we'll be using that feature much.  With the Smart Technology, all you need to do is hook up your peripherals and it will do the rest; very little difficulty setting things up which is great for those of us who are technologically impaired.  If you turn on one of your components before turning the TV on, it senses it, and will turn itself on.  This might freak you out at first, but works great, if you're lazy and just want to push power/play on the DVD player or Playstation.  Be aware:  if this is the first time you are using HD video cables it will take some getting used to.  We spent the first three movies we watched on this looking at the crispness of the picture rather than what was actually happening in the movie.  We'd never had HD before, and our cable is the basic stuff, so we didn't notice it until we played a disc (and not a Blu-ray either!).  If you're willing to splurge and you have the room, I highly recommend this television.  The only drawback so far was the registration process.  Lordy, the Samsung website is a hindrance!  Be prepared to spend LOTS of time registering their products.  Otherwise, Samsung's the way to go.

Reviews.Title: Amazing TV
Reviews.Author: timmac
Reviews.Content: I had been looking to buy a big screen TV for over a year and I jumped on this TV when Amazon had it on sale. I was immediately amazed at the clear picture. Some of the TVs I looked at in the stores had a weird motion effect (perhaps those TVs just needed adjusting), but I never saw that on this TV and that was one of the reasons I was drawn to this one. There was an issue of the TV freezing/skipping (whatever you want to call it) on certain shows, but once I changed some of the picture settings it now runs smooth and clear--I am now 100% satisfied with this TV. Whether we are watching a show, movie, Blu-ray, or playing a video game this TV displays stunning picture!The speakers are not the best you will ever hear, but they are sufficient and about what you would expect from a TV. I have still not hooked my TV up to the internet, but I'm looking forward to trying those features soon. Overall, this is one amazing TV!

Reviews.Title: Great picture- great value
Reviews.Author: taichimary
Reviews.Content: This TV was better than I expected. Picture is clear, I have had no artifact issues.It is very easy to set up and to operate.Speaker is a bit underwhelming but I expect most people will run the audio through their home theater system as I did.Volume adjustment requires a push on the remote button for each step down in volume(can't just hold button down and have it continue up or down). Not a big problem- just odd.All in all,I'm loving it.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: NY mom "NY Mom"
Reviews.Content: The physical set is beautiful  The picture on this tv felt like 3D.  The clarity was superb.  There were time I had to blast the TV because I couldnt hear.  I got a good price for this tv too.  I hate to do it BUT I am planning to return the TV because the auto motion plus was making me dizzy.  Maybe because my brain is not tune with this new technology?  When I turn it off, I felt the picture was not as clear. I felt it was too much TV for me.  I would have consider keeping it if it had a web browser but it just preloaded with apps.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic TV in every way
Reviews.Author: edison01742
Reviews.Content: I just got the TV a couple of days ago.  Setup was very easy. Didn't really need to look at the instructions except for assembling the stand. After some tweaking the settings the picture is stunning. This particular model has a different panel that most HDTVs. It's basically clear glass rather than a mat finish. The advantage is that blacks are richer and colors pop out better. While there is some reflection it doesn't seem to have much impact on the viewing.  I compared this set to the Panasonic plasma and the LGs in the same size.  There was no comparison.  Plasma was always too dark while the LG sets appeared washed out.  I also wanted the 120hz refresh since we watch lots of football and basketball. There is virtually no motion blur. The Smart hub offers a number of apps like Netflix, Hulu and Pandora. My Netflix account now works on both the Tv and my Xbox.Finally the set looks great in the living room. Clean styling with a narrow bezel that's really sharp.

Reviews.Title: An excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Mike A.
Reviews.Content: When I was ready to buy my first HDTV, I asked friends for recommendations, and checked reviews on Amazon, Cnet, and Consumer Reports. Everyone listed Samsung as a top brand, so I bought this model in the 40" size, and I love it. I don't use the Smart TV apps, so I can't speak to those, but the picture is fantastic and it's easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: dliv
Reviews.Content: The TV was delivered sooner than expected, which was great.  Thus far, everything seems to be working good.  The picture is very clear and even the sound is good.  This is our second Samsung TV, and they always seem to be top quality.

Reviews.Title: Finally An Affordable Top Quality TV.
Reviews.Author: Michael J. Ruslander
Reviews.Content: When I read reviews I often find very technical essays on the products that I am interested in. The same was true when I researched this television. Many factors went into my decision and sometimes similar model numbers were difficult to seperate in a particular review of this category of Samsung led tvs. All the reviews that I read for this tv (and going to the store and seeing a floor model in action) contributed to my decision to purchase this model. What I did find out, and this cost a review star, was that my model didn't have the wireless LAN adapter included. This additional item cost about $70. My friend got the Samsung tv that had "wireless" built in, cheaper than I got mine. Otherwise our sets were identical. Having said that, the tv is fantastic. The outside styling is contempory without potentially dating itself. The picture is absolutely clear and sharp. I was a bit disappointed in the sound quality, but when setting it on "Movie" mode the bass was better and the tinny "trebley" quality was corrected. I found that the picture setting "Natural" was most desireable as well. This television has all the bells and whistles that you could want for the price. Internet access is limited and using the remote is laborious and a bit confusing when typing in your account settings and password. Facebook is limited in displayed content, but YouTube can be breathtaking when watching HD videos. I hooked up everything to the stereo which was very easy. There is a comprehensive  E-Manual which will walk you through things that you need to know, so expect a bit of a learning curve. Out of the box, the default settings will not disappoint.Another issue that I had was not with the television, but was in fact with the purchase price. The store that shipped the set through Amazon was top rate, prompt and all was good, but they only had a few in stock. When they sold out in a matter of days, (after I received mine), Amazon had another dealer who offered the same set for about $100 cheaper. This wasn't a sale price. It would be nice if Amazon guaranteed a price, so that I would have paid the same price as someone else who bought the same tv through Amazon just a few days later.

Reviews.Title: Still trying to figure out
Reviews.Author: C. Kachulis "C Kach"
Reviews.Content: The tv is nice and clear.  It was easy to set up.  Much lighter than my 52ln6500.  I do have a problem when watching prime time tv on certain channels.  It looks like it pixelates.  I called Samsung and they said to change my cable box.  I did but it did not work.  I am still trying to figure it out.  It there are any suggestions please let me know.

Reviews.Title: First LED/LCD in the house.
Reviews.Author: Michal
Reviews.Content: Great TV, beautiful picture. $999 for 55inch LED TV (after Black Friday deal) - It couldn't go wrong. There's some flooding when the screen is completely black, but it doesn't bother me that much. I have a chance to notice that only once in a while. I watch most programs and movies in HD in the ratio without upper and lower black stripe. The remote is a bit sluggish in Smart HUB. Beware: Do not buy Samsung adapter to this TV if you are planning to mount it on the wall. It works well, but it overhangs significantly.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Vikram
Reviews.Content: I was a bit Leary about buying a TV online at Amazon, but with the sale price that it was offered I couldn't resist. I was delighted to see the TV arrive and installation was simple and took about 1/2 hr to set it up. The picture quality seems to be very good however I am not too thrilled about the smart TV - the response to command sometime could be delayed and annoying - depending on the TV series, you might or might not get all the apps on Smart TV - my TV doesn't have the browser or the yahoo apps. There isn't too many apps out there. I would rather go with an Apple TV or Roku instead.However I am happy with the TV picture quality and richness in color.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth
Reviews.Content: First time purchasing a major electronic on Amazon. No problems with shipping, absolutely love my Samsiung TV. The best picture quality I've ever seen on a flat screen, easy to set up, no regrets on my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Picture
Reviews.Author: N. Brown
Reviews.Content: Super picture! Fantastic replacement for our old Samsung LED HDTV. Looks almost 3D at times!! We have been thrilled with this purchase and would gladly recommend it

Reviews.Title: Incredible television, hands down
Reviews.Author: Andrea M. Dwyer "ADwyer"
Reviews.Content: This tv was purchased a Christmas gift for the ever-so-difficult fiance of mine. I'd say I hit a home run with this gift! The tv is incredibly thin and lightweight (when out of the box) and the image is impeccable. The speakers in the tv itself are sort of weak, but compared to the 3 year old Samsung LCD we replaced, the sound was an upgrade (Note: we have hooked our speakers to the tv for more pleasurable listening). We have not hooked it to the internet yet to explore the Smart TV world, but I am sure it will please! Overall, this tv was worth MORE than I paid on Amazon and was definitely a hit on Christmas morning! HIGHLY recommended!

Reviews.Title: Samsung 46" TV
Reviews.Author: Pacman
Reviews.Content: I'm probably not a very good person to give the technical comparisons for this TV to others of the same family. I chose the Samsung because my daughter has one and I liked it. My old TV was an old 24" analog set I've had for 15 years, so naturally the Samsung is much better than what I had. I will say that the product was shipped in a timely manner and was not damaged in any way. I'm glad I did get a larger screen, it is much better viewing. Overall I am satisfied with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Our new t.v. is Awesome!!!
Reviews.Author: MJ
Reviews.Content: We love our new t.v!! It was easy to set up with our dish and everything works like it said in the description. The resolution and color are great and it really does look awesome in our family room!!!

Reviews.Title: Great tv!
Reviews.Author: Tim
Reviews.Content: Samsung does it again! This is a great tv! Everything looks like its live, I could touch it thru the screen.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!!
Reviews.Author: M2
Reviews.Content: Have had this tv for about a month. Color is great and that is so light (30 lbs.) easy to hang on wall like a picture. Images are so clear! Great for watching the game or any other HD program.  Would highly recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: Worth the wait
Reviews.Author: N0vice
Reviews.Content: Researched this product after comparing to others out there. Price dropped and I grabbed it. Shipped and arrived on time and in one piece. Slightly better than what I expected. Would have liked for the remote to have worked with my Samsung sound bar. A little work to get it set up at first but a joy ever since. Great picture and happy with the $1,500 price point.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Gary Brodock
Reviews.Content: Samsung UN40D6000 40-Inch 1080p 120 Hz LED HDTV (Black) I think the picture is better than most other TV's I looked at and as good as a few of the better ones.  Was quite easy to set up, however I'm not into all the new electronic stuff, so hooking up my old equipment (VCR, DVD) is going to take some time for me.  I recently ordered a wall mount and the wireless network adapter, two things I should have ordered when I bought the TV.  Wasn't excited about the $60 price for the network adapter but finally decided it would be a good addition.  The picture clarity of the HD stations is just awesome.  Glad I bought this set.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32" LED TV
Reviews.Author: Brad
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with the Samsung 32" LED TV. The features offered via the network cable are great as well as being able to hook up my portable hard drive to the TV. Great picture and the speakers are pretty good too for a flatscreen TV. I would definitely recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: Amazing picture quality
Reviews.Author: Carlos Hernandez
Reviews.Content: All I can add is that I'm not part of the group having technical problems with this TV, but rather the ones enjoying it's super image quality. I bought a Toshiba 40 LED and decided it wasn't even an upgrade over my sammy LCD. When i picked up this TV i can tell you the difference was night and day. It's fantastic. Even the exterior looks great. I don't care much for the automotion plus doing nothing but dimming my display but, otherwise its all good.

Reviews.Title: Samsun UN40D6000 40 inch LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: Sheila Lanz Jimenez
Reviews.Content: My husband and I decided that it was time to bite the bullet and upgrade to an HDTV.  After looking in various stores we decided on a Samsung UN40d6000 40 inch 1080p LED HDTV.  Last month we ordered one from Amazon.  The TV arrived in good condition, delivered by UPS.  I was surprised to see how nice this television and its stand looked. We do have it hidden away in a cabinet, but it looks so good that really isn't necessary.The setup was fairly easy and when it was done the picture quality looked okay, not spectacular, just okay.  What we did not realize when we bought the set, was that for us to receive HDTV,even on an HDTV set, that we would need a box from our cable company. We got the box and when it was hooked up this is when the picture really became great.  I feel sorry for those people that are on TV now, all of their flaws really stand out.  The picture quality is fantastic.  Unlike some other reviewers, so far we have not noticed any light bleeding from the black screen. We are very pleased with this television set.  So far we have not tried to connect to the net or download movies, so I cannot comment on that.  We are not really interested in putting any pictures on our set, we do that on our computers.The only problem that we have had is of our own making.  I put the instructions, a cable, and the wifi connection in a plastic bag and put it into the box that our TV had arrived in.  A week later my husband, unaware that I had done this put the box into the trash.  Now what do we do.  Is there anyway that we can get new ones?

Reviews.Title: Excellent LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: A. T. Stephen
Reviews.Content: We've had this TV for many months now and it continues to be a purchase we are very happy about. The TV is a Samsung "Smart" TV - that means it is internet-connected and can have various apps (e.g., Netflix). We don't use that feature because we have TiVo and Apple TV boxes connected to the TV. The picture quality is excellent. Sound quality is above average, but we opted to buy a separate surround system since we wanted the home theater setup. Overall, we're very impressed and plan to buy a second, smaller Samsung LED HDTV in the same model lineup as a second TV for another room in our house.

Reviews.Title: GREAT GREAT picture quality.  The brand truly speaks for itself.
Reviews.Author: Andy Ko
Reviews.Content: Prior to purchasing this TV, I had Hitachi LED TV.  The price wasn't much cheaper compared to samsung but the picture quality was definately cheaper.  Samsung LED TVs are definatley on the edge when it comes to picture quality.  Also, I thank Amazon for the great price!

Reviews.Title: TV satisfaction
Reviews.Author: Van Nguyen
Reviews.Content: I am very satisfied with the samsung tv.It has great quality and the color is beautiful and clear for watching movies and shows broadcasted.

Reviews.Title: Best TV so far
Reviews.Author: Sat
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV after spending quite some comparing Samsung, Sony and Sharp. One word description of Picture: "Phenomenal".  Sound is little tinny, but, for this size TV, you would use home theater system anyway. So 5 out of 5. You can't go wrong. Amazon delivery was on time and very professional.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful
Reviews.Author: Zachary Tumlin
Reviews.Content: I just received this television today as an early Christmas present and I have some initial impressions to share.1. Don't complain about the quality of television speakers. If you're dropping this kind of cash on a television and don't have or plan to have external speakers also, you're silly. I didn't even bother to listen to the on-board speakers before plugging this into more serious equipment. I'm not even talking about a 5.1 system--2 speakers won't kill you.2. This television has a bonkers amount of ports, namely 4 HDMI and 3 USB.3. Clean the residue left behind on the edging from the clear plastic with the included polishing cloth and water, or dust will stick to it.4. The base lets the screen swivel about 10 to 20 degrees to each side, which is nice because the entire unit is mildly hefty.5. Does not come with a wireless receiver adapter--must be purchased separately! This is how you'll connect it to the Internet/network, unless you happen to have your router or an Ethernet wall socket nearby.6. Don't be afraid to toy with the settings (and boy are there a bunch). I increased the backlighting and sharpness a bit, but turned down the brightness. I'll probably mess with it more in the coming days. A neat feature is that it remembers your settings for each input separately, like if you're also using this as a second computer monitor sometimes.7. I'm loving the picture through HD signal so far. The good stuff comes through extremely crisp.8. Lastly, the 120Hz bit. It's important to note that there is a feature called Auto Motion Plus that can be altered, or even turned off, that can affect the smoothness of motion on screen. I don't know how separate it is from the refresh rate itself, but be aware of it. Motion does look different at first if you've been watching 60Hz all your life like I had, but I've grown to like it. It makes things more visually stimulating, but also smoother. Even HD home movies are cooler.Overall, I am really happy with this television so far.Update: Works great as a secondary display for your computer, although you probably won't be able to get the backlighting and/or colors to match exactly. I use it to watch Hulu, ESPN3, YouTube, etc. through.

Reviews.Title: Smart TV?
Reviews.Author: Dave Bell
Reviews.Content: I had loved everything Samsung having purchased another TV, a Blu-Ray, a refrigerator and a range this year.  Everything is positive about the television EXCEPT the Smart TV does NOT allow home theater sound!  For example, one can play Pandora music only through the limited built-in speakers! The Blu-Ray will play Pandora and other apps through the other TV's home theater sound so I erroneously thought the Smart TV would be smart enough to do the same!

Reviews.Title: Great, Except Flashlighting Effect
Reviews.Author: B. Caullay "songbirdmi"
Reviews.Content: Everything is wonderful, except the distracting 'flashlighting' effect (bleed-through of backlight at the 4 corners).After noticing it, I looked it up on line, and several people have complained about the issue. Probably more nerdy types, but I notice it during dark scenes and it is distracting.Samsung cutomer service was awful (communicating with mollusks couldn't be much harder). I could not get through to the coveted 'level 2' support - instead the woman just followed her script, ignoring my pleas.  They are aware of the issue, but don't have a fix, according to other internet sources.In the event that one serial number TV can differ from the next, I'm trying replacement. If that one isn't any better, Sammy is taking a hike.Unfortunate, because everything else is great.By the way - if you are struggling with the 'soap-opera effect', just turn off the "automotion plus" feature (a tip that customer service never offered).

Reviews.Title: Best quality/price ratio on 55 incher
Reviews.Author: JKM
Reviews.Content: I got this from BB for $1097 two weeks ago with free shipping and in home setup. Been researching for a year while pricing fluctuates on 55" LED without 3D or built-in internet or wireless. Terrific picture once I made adjustments to get rid of the "soap opera" effect most of these TVs have. Have tried DirecTV, blu-ray and surround sound system so far. All worked great. The install/setup took 2 guys 10 minutes including putting the stand together and box removal. I upgraded from a Samsung 37" with 720p and it made a big difference.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: CJ
Reviews.Content: TV works great, still learning how to use the SmarTV product, but very satisfied with the TV. Picture is great, and showed up in great condition. I only wish it would have an Amazon app to be able to watch movies/TV shows online.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: jerod
Reviews.Content: superior product.  Really enjoying the "smart tv" apps.  I switched from a audiovox 32" flat panel t.v. to this 55" LED, and the switch is obviously night and day.  I purchased this t.v. with high expectations and all were met.  Cannot wait to watch my first bluray movie when my PS3 is delivered.  I know some people were complaining about the speakers on the television i cannot comment since i have it hooked to my Yamaha surrond sound.  The quality of the picture is simply amazing.  my wife complained that the picture was too realistic, its like watching a movie or television show through a window.  do yourself a favor and purchase this t.v. its worth the money and you won't be disapointed.

Reviews.Title: Great Tv, Clear Picture
Reviews.Author: Rosie
Reviews.Content: I was surprised how good the HD quality was.  It is so clear that it actually took a couple of weeks to get used to the clarity.  Great tv by Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Great TV at a super price!
Reviews.Author: Marty
Reviews.Content: Just purchased this TV for under $900.  Super picture quality for a fantastic price.  Easy to set up and it looks great.  I am very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Good product, very sad delivery experience
Reviews.Author: Louis P. Hanner
Reviews.Content: Good TV and great price.  I have purchased two prior Samsung LCD tvs from Amazon, and have always been VERY happy.  This time, the delivery was 3 days late, sloppily handled by Pilot and Forward Air, and the tracking info at the Amazon site was never updated throughout the experience.  I was very disappointed in this evolution of the Amazon large item delivery.  Ceva has been flawless in the past.........i think the problem was with Pilot!  They fumbled on this one.

Reviews.Title: Good LED TV
Reviews.Author: Richard R. Jacobs Jr. "jake80"
Reviews.Content: We bought this HDTV about a month ago and it has a great pixThe sound is good but not great and the tilt option is a plusThe only con I can comment on is the location of the HDMI ports they are in a recess and if your componets are on the left sideof the TV you will need a 90 degree HDMI elbow to hook it up also if you have any adaptor to put on the HDMI connectoe it will not fitBut this shopuld not be a factor in decideing to buy or notMy suggestion after buying this HDTV is to BUY IT you will NOT be diaappointed

Reviews.Title: Excellent....fell in love with this TV
Reviews.Author: Naren
Reviews.Content: This is my first LED TV and believe me I fell in love with it. A really great product for an affordable price.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN46D6000 LED TV
Reviews.Author: J. Knipe "watcher"
Reviews.Content: Excellent picture quality with many usefull "Smart" feature options. The "LED" display does not generate nearly the heat of an "LCD" TV. Buy this TV with confidence.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: WXP
Reviews.Content: Good pic, audio, great TV! Only quirk, onboard smart tools do not have browser and are boring, but I would highly recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: Great LED picture
Reviews.Author: James R. Fulton
Reviews.Content: Saved over $100 on a great LED TV that keeps getting high ratings from every source. The concept of having the TV manual on the TV is quite novel if you get it to turn on (which it did).

Reviews.Title: Straight Munz!!!!
Reviews.Author: big rodney
Reviews.Content: What an amazing TV!!!! Samsung once again has out done themselves and made one of the best looking TVs money can buy!!!

Reviews.Title: Another magical device
Reviews.Author: old soldier
Reviews.Content: Purchased this unit along with a Samsung Blu-ray player a month ago.  Who says you need a "teen-aged techie" in a black and white van to set up a television?  Followed the directions (which were simple), hooked it up and away we went!  Picture is absolutely great.  The digital audio feed to my surround sound system combines to deliver that "almost there" feeling.  First program watched was "Planet Earth" series..... WOW! Samsung's Internet Hub and apps are easy to use and provide a good variety of options for music as well as video.

Reviews.Title: Mixed
Reviews.Author: Sunny
Reviews.Content: In general I like the product. I do have some problems. There was no User Manual in the package nor was there an "Lan" Wireless adapter which I believe is included. After setting up the unit I am still struggling with a digital connection which I thought would be available without an additional box but so faris still a mystery.

Reviews.Title: Almost perfect
Reviews.Author: EMAWJack
Reviews.Content: This is a really great TV and a quality product, but it's not without its flaws. Out of the box it isn't nearly as impressive as it can be. It took a couple of weeks of tweaking the settings so that the motion looked right and wasn't glitchy, and so that it didn't have the "soap opera" look. That being said, the picture is now stunning and meets my expectations.The only other issue I have is with backlight bleeding. If you're watching anything with a 16:9 ratio you won't notice it, but when you watch a movie with hard matting (black bars) it is very noticable in all four corners of the screen. Its not awful, and generally doesn't affect the picture quality, but its annoying.This is a great product and worth the money, but I would consider looking at other brands/models of LED to see if the bleeding problem is mitigated.Amazon's service was fairly good and the shipping was fast. I did speak to a customer service rep. about the bleeding and he immediately deferred my concern and gave me Samsung's service hotline. I understand that Amazon will attempt to not lose money by accepting a return/exchange if they can avoid it, but when they advertise "FREE 30-day TV returns," my expectation is for them to honor that with very little resistance.

Reviews.Title: Buy this if you want great HDTV value!
Reviews.Author: Jimmy Gee
Reviews.Content: This TV exceeded our expectations on almost every aspect. The picture is really unbelievably clear. The features are everything described and more. The frame around the screen looks like a fine art frame. The included stand is heavy and sturdy. We mounted the TV to a new stand, Walker Edison Regal 42-Inch 4-in-1 TV Stand with Mount, Wood/Black by Walker Edison. The sound is probably like most new sets, good but not great. Connecting the set to my 20 year old Nakamichi receiver, old Sony DVD player, and old VCR went well. Most adapters were included and work well for my set up. The Smart TV is a super feature as well.

Reviews.Title: Very happy with purchase.
Reviews.Author: Lake Ranger
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV with all the features I was looking for in an HD TV.  The picture quality is outstanding.  It has a very secure and attractive base stand. The sound is a little weak but I'll be connecting a Home Theater system so this will not be an issue.  Overall I would highly recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: UN32D6000 - Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: S. Lockhart
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tv to replace a 20 some year old 26inch tube tv in my mothers bedroom.  First, the picture quality is amazing. The color depth makes the images look amazing.  I just can not say enough about the picture quality. Setup was a snap, I also purchased the Samsung wireless adapter had it plugged in before I powered on the tv. When the setup started answered some questions, got to the network setup, picked my wireless network (it picked up a couple of my neighbors networks) and it joined in seconds. I was prompted to perform a firmware update, took a minute or two, tv rebooted and I was done. Switched source to HDMI 1 and first was like oh no. Awful picture, but remembered I didn't change anything on the ATT Uverse box. Once that was done, picture perfect. Now the one thing I do not like is the sound. I think they could have done a better job with that, so I will come up with a solution so it doesn't sound like a tin can.The smart hub is nice, a little cluttered.  This isn't a 3D tv and default icon it is on is a 3D icon. I am sure I can delete.  Navigating through is a little sluggish.  For the Netflix, the steaming is flawless.
